website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, contemporary bed desk with loads of adjustability. Holds laptops up to 17 inches.
pros: Contemporary styling with light wood finish tray
Highly adjustable with 5 desktop angles and 5 height adjustments
cons: Some wish it had lower options for height
Leg design allows you to lock it unevenly, which leads to instability

customer_reviews.title: Great portable Work space!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this table!! I needed a portable work space to use in different parts of my house. I have a bad back and neck issues so I really wanted something sturdy and useful to use in different situations so I would be hunched over with the lap top on my lap. This works PERFECTLY! Easy to fold and store. Easy to use and set up. A def. Must have! Sturdy, well made, light and easy to use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dejan

customer_reviews.title: convenient little table
customer_reviews.text: As I can see, it's a elaborate table. The main reason for me to buy it is I don't want to put my laptop on my leg while using it in some situation, like lying on the sofa and bed. I like it design that can fix my laptop from sliding (as shown in picture). Also, the height and angle and be easily adjusted to deal with any circumstances. Of course, its low price is also an attractive point.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality laptop stand
customer_reviews.text: Good quality laptop stand. Sturdy for the purpose. Highly recommended. Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.author: VictorCreator

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My back has been hurting so bad during the pandemic and working from home and I ordered this table to help out my sitting and it is PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: jane chapman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a very fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I work from home, so an organized, positive space is important to me. This product works well for my needs and also allowed me to create a standing desk situation for far less money than the competitors. The laptop stand is really well made, easy to set-up and excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl Kisandria Varga

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk- Can Adjust Very High
customer_reviews.text: This desk is awesome. I have a 17 inch laptop and having room for my mouse next to it is great. It can also adjust to a bunch of different heights. The shortest setting is more than enough for me. The best thing is unlike smaller desks my legs can actually fit under it. It seems pretty sturdy also. I'd highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Remmie Liandris

customer_reviews.title: Unstable - Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Regretting this purchase. Such poor quality. It is so flimsy and shaky no matter what angle it's at. I have a mac book and the weight of that alone is causing it to tilt. As I type this review my mouse has fallen off two times from all the wobbling. The box was a nightmare to unbox so I can't even return it now. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your legs from laptop heat!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! My laptop gets so hot on my legs that I needed a mini-desk, which is exactly what this is. Because it's so adjustable to height and angle, I can set it at the perfect settings for me. Can recommend this product enough. Sturdy, looks great, and extremely functional.
customer_reviews.author: Susiesmowbird

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the bed
customer_reviews.text: The TaoTronics foldable table stand has an excellent size, and the overall adjust-ability is great. The folding, adjustable height legs work well on a bed or sofa, but are too widely spaced for use in a chair. If the leg width spacing was also adjustable, or even narrow enough for chair use, the table would easily rate 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D D Walters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and adjustable. Make me relaxed on the bed
customer_reviews.author: Hanyu

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I needed so I can do work for school. I can sit ok the couch or place it on the coffee table. It helps me sit up straight when I have it on the highest height on the table. I love the ability to tilt the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Patrica Jarber

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this the day before heart surgery and boy am I glad I did! This is perfect for eating on or doing work. I used it for both. My large lap top and mouse were on and still had plenty of room. I love that it has these flip up things to keep your lap top from moving around, but can be folded down while eating. This made life way easier after surgery and I still use it even now when working from home. It's great on the couch and great in the bed. I live it and highly recommend it to anyone! Actually a friend just ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: Mieghan Damron

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if maybe I got a defective one, but I was super excited to get this and then was extremely disappointed in the product. Not only do the legs NOT lay evenly on the floor. When you change the height of the table....it doesn't stay clicked in. Also.... the plastic feels super cheap. I'm really not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a medical student and spend most of my day on my computer and it was killing my neck. I bought this laptop desk this week and it's made the world of difference. I can study in bed with the computer at my eye level which helps my neck and I can put it on my desk to use as a standing desk as well. It's plenty big enough to fit my laptop and some notes to write on and it's really comfortable. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fedorowicz

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it.,
customer_reviews.text: Ideally it works well but the top surface is slippery so my tablet slips off. It’s not sturdy and feels awkward and clumsy when trying to use it. I don’t like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: M.T

customer_reviews.title: Lowest setting only
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient lap desk that I use for laptop gaming in bed. My only complaint is that the adjustments on the legs do not lock as well as I had hoped. With any real weight of normal use, they unlock and the desk descends to the lowest setting. However, I use the lowest setting anyway, so no complaints here. This would also make a decent stand-up desk height adjustment on a regular desk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: MAYBE DEFECTIVE- BENDING LEGS
customer_reviews.text: I have had this table for less than a month and the legs of the table are bent. The only things I’ve had on this table were my MacBook Air and a composition notebook and pen. In the picture both ends of the table are are the same height.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A bit shaky legs.  Table top is nice but legs provide just adequate strength.
customer_reviews.text: I am mainly using it for surface while on bed. After using legs couple times, I wasn't so satisfied so just decided to use them folded down. The table top though is very nice. < UPDATE - raised rating to 4 from 3 > I appreciate company contacting me to address the issue I have had with desk. In addition, the desk itself has proved itself to be useful in many ways despite my initial perception. I am bumping it to 4 star from 3.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Handy product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use it everyday for my laptop stand. I’ve used it also on my kitchen table to make my own stand up desk. Super easy to work and adjust. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Maria sederes

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life??
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I’m a senior in college and all of my classes are currently online. I could’ve used this the last several years while sitting on the couch or laying in bed. It fits my laptop and a mousepad perfectly. It’s very comfortable to use and easy to adjust. It seems to be sturdy. It’s perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted/Needed
customer_reviews.text: I mainly wanted the stand to alleviate some neck pain/headaches from using my laptop while sitting on the couch or sitting in bed (which is way more time than at a desk). I have been using it all day today and already notice a big difference. It seems like it is quality built and the parts look like they will last a while. I appreciate the multiple height and angle settings to fit wherever I am.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: The first desk I received had defective clips that didn’t hold my laptop when tilted, but I received great customer service and a replacement item that works properly. I can’t emphasize enough about the quality of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Love it it’s just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love it it’s just what I needed. Good quality easy to use and I can cross my legs under if I want. Good width
customer_reviews.author: Rakivie

customer_reviews.title: Good pick
customer_reviews.text: This product is good and also for its price. I am using it right now and am very happy with the purchase. Its pretty sturdy, good quality, easy to use clips to move it up/down or angle it. It gives me a good angle for the laptop, good height. Only thing is, the leg space (between the legs of the table) i feel is not enough. A few inches more would have been more comfortable - this helps to pull the table closer to you. Nevertheless, the ergonomics is good, its worth its money and solves my purpose. I would recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: SPP

customer_reviews.title: Standing Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a review explicitly saying they bought this to turn their desk or table into a standing workspace. I have online school now (sigh) and I learned my lesson spring quarter: sitting alllll day makes me fat, tired, and hunchbacked. This bad boy requires NO assembly, it just slides out of the box ready to go. That means it folds flat. I am a 5'5'' woman and found that even on my lowest counter this is tall enough to comfortably type and read but I prefer to have it on a higher counter to allow me to write. Besides my laptop this is the most expensive school-thing I've ever bought and it's SO worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Surface is not slippery, so my laptop stays put.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this stand. The surface is textured so my laptop doesn't slide around (although my coffee cup sometimes does; I just have to keep an eye on it). The only thing I have to be careful about is not sliding it sideways on the bed, as the legs can start to collapse But once I realized this, it became a very minor issue
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Worse service.
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. Since opening, I have wasted time speaking with Customer Service (an exemplar of bad training and robot-like people). Their server couldn't accept photos or a video demonstrating the problem. Fortunately, I went to Amazon and received an immediate refund. After that, the manufacturer, TaoTronics, offered to send new clips. Ha--the thing was in the trash because it was too crumby to give to Goodwill. I'm sure there are much better options. They shouldn't be in business. Run, don't walk, away from pressing the order button.
customer_reviews.author: Adhock

customer_reviews.title: Meh ... Not very strudy
customer_reviews.text: The design and finish is impressive. I like the fact that it folds easily and is compact to carry around the house once folded.What does concern me is the sturdiness and the longevity. It seems to be a tiny bit wobbly now and so should work well, at least for a few days. I am worried as time passes, gradual use may lead it to become less and less sturdy. I would have definitely liked a more solid well engineered feel to it considering the price they charge. Not a bad purchase, but not a great one either. just meh .... !
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who works in bed from time to time, like a normal business professional does. He used it twice, and now it lives under the bed with the other crap we’re too lazy to throw away. I’ll probably leave it there until I get tired of my bedroom and rearrange the furniture, then off to the dump it goes
customer_reviews.author: Amanda hart

customer_reviews.title: Great lap table to use in my recliner!
customer_reviews.text: Great lap table to use in my recliner! I play games on my 55" HDTV, with a 28" 4K monitor on a table to my left, hooked up to a laptop. I gather stats from my games and use this lap table to hold a wireless keyboard and mouse, to utilize the laptop. The only improvement I would suggest is the ability to telescope-lengthen the feet from the legs, to better straddle the recliner sections. But, its working fine, and I can later add some extensions if I want. The quality and construction are top-notch. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: HeTiCu

customer_reviews.title: Broke one month later
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure I would recommend this. I had it for 1 month and the legs broke. Of course it broke right after the July 20th return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Dorthy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy, adjustable, & long enough for using external mouse & 10-Keypad
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this while on my couch or in bed to use w/my laptop. I was look for a desktop to use in bed long enough to use w/a 10-key numeric keypad and external mouse. The adjustable vertical tilt & height allow me to use it in more places than what I initially bought for. I purchased the following mouse and 10-Key numeric keypad to use w/the desktop. The combo works perfectly w/out the space limits that often make using an external mouse.
customer_reviews.author: BalboaMom

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Great for studying in bed. Fits my Microsoft Surface with keyboard Comfortably with enough room to spare for some papers. It is sturdy but I guess that has to do with the type of bed you have. Mine is pretty firm. Definitely worth it. I sometimes eat in it too. Love the adjustable height and the different angle options. The locking mechanisms for height and angle are excellent. Normal pressure does not destabilize it.
customer_reviews.author: EstebanTop Contributor: Graphic Novels

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough to sit for long hours and cross legged.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this desk. I have been working from my bed and couch throughout this pandemic and the this lap desk is way more comfortable. I am an overweight person, so my main concern was that the desk might not fit comfortably over my lap. But the desk is quite wide so I can sit comfortably even with cross legs. The height adjustment options are nice, but I would have preferred one more level up as well. The angular adjustments are perfect for lazy work! LOL. Overall, excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eastern!!

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. It's very lightweight and easy to use. My only complaint is the lever for one of the legs gets stuck when trying to adjust it at times, but it's not that big of a deal to me personally. I love that it's wide enough so that it fits my laptop as well as my mousepad. The clips work well when it's angled so that my laptop doesn't slide off. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Not built well at all
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs gives out after a month and a half of use. I loved this thing initially, but am incredibly disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Williams

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, could be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: This laptop table does the trick for holding a laptop/mouse. I like that I can adjust both the height and angle of the tabletop. It's both ergonomic and roomy. I was a bit unimpressed at the sturdiness. It's very wobbly, and I wouldn't trust it to hold anything very heavy. One of the legs is looser than the other and shifts now and then. Time will tell how sturdy it stays. Also, the clamps that hold your laptop base in place when the table is tilted sit right where my wrists rest, which is uncomfortable. I think this is a good product, but maybe not quite worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Stand is Wonderful !  So Many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is wonderful. It has made my day so much easier! It gives me the option to stand at my desk or sit , as it has three height positions. My appointment book fits great right under it. This helps when patients are checking out at counter, not to glance over. It even has two clips to hold pages. Would work for all computer lap top sizes. Legs fold in for easy transport, change heights in a flash, I cant say enough about this product. I am thinking about getting one for my home to use when I am sitting on the couch using my computer or for the kids for homework. LB
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: A great sit or stand desk option - Good quality and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to deal with working from home and being in my laptop for 10-12 hours a day and having the flexibility to sit on the couch or move and create a standing desk. It works very well so far - decent sturdiness and I love the tabs to hold the laptop and the ability to adjust the tilt. Definitely would recommend! Amazing value for the money also!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to college, and doing a lot of her homework in her bedroom. This desk let's her stretch out when using her laptop. I gave one to my husband who is disabled and sitting at a computer desk is difficult. He can use this on his lap for his laptop orepair tablet. The legs are a little stiff to pull down and put back, but even with a disability my husband can do it. They both like the ability to adjust the angle of the desk. Haven't used it that way yet, but should work well for serving meals in bed. Both family members really like it. If fact my daughter bought one for her daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to WFM
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and when my husband is home like to enjoy some time next to him so I researched lots of lap desks or portable laptop carts and this one had so many functions and was more versatile. I use it while on my recliner sofa, on the floor, and even add it to my dining table or desk to make a quick standing desk. I love how I can shorten one leg when sitting in an awkward position on the couch, the grippy keeps my laptop from sliding and there is plenty of room for my mouse pad. Also you can make the desk flat or slant it, it is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: MayFam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the new school year!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my kids as they start the new school year virtually. They each use a laptop for school and this is great for them to use. I also love how they can put it on a table and turn this into a standing desk! I'm sure a lot of people are ordering things like this right now since so many kids will be learning from home. I would definitely recommend this one. Easy to raise and tilt. I did put a small mousepad on there with a wrist pad to complete the desk. Easy to use right out of the box and so far it has been great for use with their laptops.
customer_reviews.author: CTSmith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile laptop desk
customer_reviews.text: The laptop desk is of high quality and very sturdy. The wooden top has a nice finish to it and was constructed well. The leg stands lock in place when brought into the down position and they can easily be extended to raise the height of the table. At its highest setting, it fits perfectly over my lap without being in the way. I got a large size and there's enough room to fit both my Surface and mousepad if needed. I'm sure this table could easily be used for eating too but I haven't tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Wide legs and many adjustable positions
customer_reviews.text: Just got this last week as an early Father's Day gift from my wife. I really like this Lap Desk. It is very wide (like 21") which is good for us "larger guys" who don't like to feel cramped by one of these portable desk devices. I like that it opens easily, folds away for storage quickly, has adjustable sturdy locking positions, can tilt and lock those positions too and is a large surface. The large surface makes it have enough room for a 15" Macbook Pro (seen in images) and still have plenty of room to add a mouse or trackpad. Great device, very happy with the purchase and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Guten

customer_reviews.title: Cute, very easy to store and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop table! It comes basically preassembled which really surprised me since the box it was shipped in was so small. Once you fold it up, it’s actually very small and flat that I just store it under my couch. I love using it when I’m watching tv and need to do some work on my laptop. I also like using it when I’m just watching some shows on my laptop while in bed. Love the color! Got the light wood and white one and it’s soooo cute. Didn’t realize this company makes other goods besides electronics but their products are usually great quality
customer_reviews.author: C32

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Table Stand perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I love my new lap desk! It was just what I was looking for. The height adjusts, the top tilts and the legs will fold for storage. For my use , I could have it a couple of inches narrower in width. I use it in my recliner and it barely fits there. I use it to hold books to read and my IPad for reading and game playing. Also great for crossword puzzle working.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Godwin

customer_reviews.title: It works and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like to work in bed in the evenings while watching TV. This is exactly what I was looking for. I like the adjustable features, although I wish I could lower it just a bit more but I can live with the lowest point. It is what it is. I also wish it was just slightly longer I guess. I have a 17.3" laptop and not enough room to put a mouse next to the laptop. I'm sure I could find an extension for the mouse, but I'll live with it. In total, this product is just as described and workable for what I needed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rippey

customer_reviews.title: Versatile table
customer_reviews.text: I have used this table in so many ways since I've got it. As a standing desk on top of my normal work desk, a way to lean on the bed and work comfortably, sit on a floor and work, carry it outside to place the laptop to workout and what not..! I am quite happy with the purchase. Only thing, its hard to write on top of the table as it isn't that sturdy and gets wobbly when you write. But it's perfectly fine to type or read something on the laptop on the table. My favorite way to use it has been as a standing desk and definitely helped convert my home office into a standing desk comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Rajashree

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional table.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as mostly I am working from home these days and my back hurts sitting in same position all the time. This table has solved the problem as now I can work from anywhere like couch, bed, carpet. It measures 25 inch long and 14 inch wide and nicely fit my 15 inch laptop with mouse. Height is adjustable from 9.4 inches to 12.6 inches. There is little rubber piece at the bottom which holds laptop and mouse in place when inclined.. It folds flat for easy storage. Sometime, I use it as breakfast table on bed. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PKG

customer_reviews.title: Well made, so many uses
customer_reviews.text: Really like this laptop table. I purchased it for a bed table to be able to watch movies in bed handsfree. However, this is also an excellent work desk and has ample space to the right for mouse usage and the table has a little lip that catches the mouse even with the table is tilted. But wait, I also use it on my existing desk to make it into a standing desk. Quality is great, I have adjusted and readjusted the heights over and over again and the adjustment mechanism seems quite sturdy. I really have no problem giving this TaoTronics Lap Desks Bed Trays a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: E Grand

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the bed!
customer_reviews.text: Just another way to be efficient (lazy)...??? Not sure which Lol... To work from home. I've been so tired of holding my laptop and papers in bed I broke down and got this little desk and I'm so glad I did! It is actually very sturdy and a great size for your lap. I just keep my mouse next to me so I don't have to lift my arms (come on- that's like hard work! 🤣) and I can pretty much never leave my bed now! Except for when my dog pack finds me then it's a little hard to work from my bed! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was concerned this lap desk was going to be too large. The medium size was sold out, so I took a chance, ordered the large, and am so glad I did. The desk is a very nice size. It holds a laptop, but has some room on the right side where you could put a phone, papers, even a textbook if you needed to. It's not a lot of extra space, but just enough that gives you another usable area if you need it. Well designed, easy to adjust, folds down nicely when not in use if you are short on space.
customer_reviews.author: Toy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice in laptop stands! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was hesitant to spend this much on an item without having any prior knowledge of the manufacturer or seller. I was prepared for it to be small, flimsy and way too narrow for my wide hips. I was pleasantly surprised to find it very sturdy and fits over my lap comfortably. It is very easy to adjust the height and angle. The desktop has plenty of room to use a mouse. Only thing I would put in the “con” column is the laptop clips. They don’t open wide enough to fit over my laptop, but just having them there is enough to keep it from sliding forward.
customer_reviews.author: PGA26

customer_reviews.title: Not really suitable for surface devices
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk however it’s not wide enough for my surface pro 3 since I need extra space for the kickstand. So I may have to return it. You also need to make sure you adjust legs and turns at the same time and check before locking, because it will allow you to lock unevenly
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Well made bed table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Helps with reading, coloring, writing, as well as a sturdy table to eat while in bed. Adjustable for different heights and can tilt at different angles for support while using a laptop, paper, magazine or book. It is really helpful. I have even left the legs folded in, while using this to lay across the arms of my recliner. Has an edge with clips to hold magazine, book or laptop from slipping off edge & a silicone section to keep wireless mouse from skipping off edge. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Wow - perfect
customer_reviews.text: This has far exceeded my expectations. There is plenty of room for the computer and mouse. I was a little concerned about body space under the table, no worries, it has more than enough space, even for a plus size adult. The features are easy to heighten, lower or tilt. The two tabs are an added nice feature and although they do not clip in place to hold the computer, they will stop the computer from falling off when the table is tilted. Great product. We may buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried that the ledge at the bottom might be a problem, as I bought this for use with my iPad, not a laptop, and I like to use the pencil. Unfounded! The edge is low-profile and the clips are nearly flush, also smoother than they appear in the photos. The table is very sturdy. I had a pillow-bottom lap desk and it was hot and too low (I ended up curling over it and straining my back). This is perfect at its lowest height. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Release the darned leg locks (grey snaps) before trying to open the legs or adjust the table angle!
customer_reviews.text: I see reviews here stating that plastic parts broke while trying to make adjustments. If you don't release those leg locks, you will surely break something when pivoting the legs or adjusting the table angle. I really like everything about this table: Looks, ease of use, construction quality and the comfort it brings to my laptop use. I only wish I had bought it sooner. Highly recommended, but I notice the price is creeping over $70. now. It was $67. a couple of days ago.
customer_reviews.author: chartel

customer_reviews.title: High quality cutie laptop desk - Amazing delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I though it could take me weeks to receive this item, as Amazon estimated. The seller shipped it super fast! This is exactly what I looked for! Since have moved to study online, my girl was getting tired with her desk. I bought this for her final weeks of this school year. She was so happy to carry around from bedroom to living, from bed down to the floor to get her assignments done! I wish I would have found it earlier. I would say it is cute, convenient, performed as it's meant to. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Han H.

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a standing desk
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I needed a way to convert my desk into a standing desk without having to purchase an expensive new desk. This is perfect- raises 5 levels and the table top is fully adjustable to a variety of angles. I could d not be happier with the quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: shannon fleming

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: What a back-saver! I love how this thing tilts to any angle I want. I can fit my 15" laptop AND a mouse pad and mouse on it. It's sturdy - takes the full weight of my arms as I type on the laptop. Height works great for setting this up on the counter/bar/island and standing while working on the laptop. Folds right down for easy storage and transport. GREAT buy for the price, don't hesitate to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: M B.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal as a laptop riser, not great to improve comfort while working from couch
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is best to go on top of a sturdy desk to increase the height of your lap top for an ergonomic perspective than anything else. The legs don’t really allow it to stand sturdy on something like a couch and can be a bit awkward to use when in bed or on a couch. If you are looking for a lap top riser, this would be great. If you are looking for something to improve your comfort while working from couches or in bed, I would purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift ( I got the brown large one) to my roommate who has been looking for the right thing to put her laptop on while working at home, and since it was her birthday, I thought this might work for her as she likes something that she can bring anywhere. She is so happy with it and has been using it in bed, on the couch, and table for when she feels like she wants to stand while working. Price is pretty reasonable! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Windchime516

customer_reviews.title: Delicate but serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very light, easy to use . Holds a 17” Mac with plenty of room for mouse and notebook. The clamps are delicate and don’t hold the laptop down but it stops the laptop from falling over when angled. The surface is very slippery. I will be getting a grip mat since the laptop slides from left to right if the desk is moved. This desk is great use for bed, couch, floor, on a desk, and for posture. When the desk is adjusted at an angle the desk will waddle because the laptop’s weight is to one side, but this desk serves it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this product, I always had my laptop on my lap, and that was super uncomfortable because I would need a mouse and it would just be next to the track-pad. Of course, there wasn't enough room there, and I would have to constantly lift off my mouse. Now, with this lap desk, I can comfortably use my computer and mouse on my bed without hurting my back. Would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this desk, and how it tilts. The little clips at the bottom are great for holding a book in place. It falls over if you're not careful with how you move in the bed. Not ideal for left-handed people. I've only had it for 2 days but I really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this Laptop Table. It is perfect for sitting on the couch working or playing games on the computer. There is plenty of room for your mouse and easily adjusts to different heights and slants. It is sturdy and should last however long you need it. Be forewarned though for me it is a bit heavy when trying to pick up off your lap and put down especially with the dog snuggled up on you. But other than that perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Convenient replacement for sit/stand desk
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Really sturdy, I can trust my laptop won't fall off of it Clips to ensure my documents remain on the desk Can put this on top of a desk to make it a standing desk so saved me a few hundred bucks Easy to adjust height of the desk Large size allowed me to put everything I needed onto the desk Foldable legs so it can be put away without taking up a lot of space when not in use Cons: Only con is that I wish the height could be adjusted a bit higher, but that's not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Rai

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Relationship With My Dog
customer_reviews.text: So I had a rather specific issue: while using my lapto it is always where my dog likes to be. She doesn’t appreciate a hard laptop balanced in her, and don’t appreciate my laptop being at odd angles to accommodate said dog. I ordered this with the hopes I could still sit in my favorite chair, but have perch for my laptop over my dog, and this is PERFECT! The various adjustments allow me to make it usable depending of the dog’s whim. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Girl

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics does it again -- another product I love
customer_reviews.text: I love the leg room under the table, which is adjustable on each leg. The legs fold in when the lap desk is not in use, but regardless of whether they're folded up in storage or out in use, they stay that way, if that makes sense. I'm not worried that the legs will collapse or fold in while I'm using it. Really came in handy when I was studying for my boards and needed to change scenery from my regular desk. Allowed me to move to my bed or couch and still have plenty of "desk space." Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: clairenortham

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in two of my favorite places to use my laptop, in my favorite easy chair and bed. I don't think it could be any more perfect. I got the medium size, which seems perfect but I may also get a larger size for when I wanna use my mouse too. It folds up quick and tight, it's plenty sturdy when in use. I'm actually considering throwing it in my carry on when I travel so I can use it at the hotel. Highly recommended to anyone thinking about buying this. Do it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Use this thing ALL THE TIME!
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for my needs! I use with my laptop and have room for a mouse to the left as well. I like the rubber edge that keeps the mouse from rolling off. There are pop up stoppers to keep your laptop from sliding off if using at a tilted angle. I use this on my sofa and in my bed. The height is adjustable and you can tilt the table as well. Can be used to eat as well which is handy if anyone is home sick. I highly recommend this lap desk!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna H

customer_reviews.title: You can adjust the height and angle to which you want!
customer_reviews.text: As a college student, I study anywhere at any time, even before sleep. I hate to study in a study room that’s way far from the bedroom. So I was looking for a table that can be folded and can put on the bed at the same time. First, I thought about those tables that are in the hospital, but then our bed has no area for the table to go under. While searching, I found this one. Thank God, it’s perfect!! You can adjust the height and angle to which you want.
customer_reviews.author: My Tu

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a standing desk
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for standing desks but also wanted the option to work from bed/couch (because why not?). I love that this lets me do both. It folds up really small, would be easy to transport, and has a lot of flexibility height-wise. Plus my pretty large laptop fits on it nicely. I like that it tilts so the desk surface doesn't have to be completely flat. If you want to try standing a little more, or just want the flexibility to work from wherever I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great lapdesk for students!
customer_reviews.text: I am a student and read a lot of ebooks for my classes. Sitting at my desk in my office to do that makes my back hurt so I purchased this desk for sitting in a recliner or on my bed. I am happy to say that this desk has proved very useful for reading e-books, for doing homework, and for writing emails on my laptop. I have even used it for eating a meal or two, and reading paperback books. I like that it can be tilted and still keep your laptop in place.
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: great and allows good air circulation
customer_reviews.text: In the summer months, I just got too warm with a conventional lap desk. This one allows 4-6" above the lap for air to circulate. I have it at an angle, which is good for typing on the device. it's natural for me to rest my hands on the tray and that overcomes the bit of instability because of the chair that I am using. It's very easy to just pick the whole thing up with my laptop on it and either set it on my foot stool or on the floor if I need to get up. I'm very happy with it. and it seems to be quite durable and well-made for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: cookingMaven

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I wish I had discovered this years back!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I cannot believe how effective this little thing is. I truly wish I had discovered this years back. Working from home can finally be fun: you can actually very comfortably sit on your couch and use your laptop and work. It doesn’t get any better than this. The height adjustment etc is very easy, requires no effort. Also, you don’t need to build it yourself, it comes all ready. Truly recommending it, worth the price completely. I’m just upset I didn’t discover this sooner :(
customer_reviews.author: Seattleite

customer_reviews.title: OMG..love this for working at home!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for working at home on my laptop. Is sturdy, adjustable and easy to store. My son loves it to color on and teen for doing homework on his bed. **If you found this review helpful, please take a moment and hit the button below and let Amazon know! Very much appreciated 😁
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Neck Ache is Gone
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and spend 8-10 hours on my laptop. I change positions constantly and my legs get really hot from holding the computer. I found this on Amazon and decided to give TaoTronics lap desk a go. IT WORKS!!! No matter where I sit, the sofa, recliner or at my desk, my neck no longer cramps and aches after a long day. It is adjustable with tilt and height. For work the TaoTronics lap desk will create an ergonomically correct work space.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M. Molder

customer_reviews.title: Works with 17" laptops
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop desk if you aren't sitting on a sofa with cushions nearly the same width as the base. That the legs sink between the sofa cushions where I like to sit limits the usefulness of this item for me BUT the others features are great. The clips on the front had no trouble holding my heavy gaming laptop, and the ability to slant the top made it easy to get a good viewing angle. Even though it isn't perfect for my application, I do not regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Feldy Fan

customer_reviews.title: great work from home desk option
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to upgrade my office since I started working from home. I want to change up my location but it is hard to do that other than my desk or the dinning room table. This desk allows me to do work on my bed, on my couch, or on the floor. I like that it has a retractable blockers keep my laptop from falling off and a soft wrist rest helps prevent strain. Also, it is adjustable for the angles and height. It folds away nicely, and I have plenty of leg room with this device. One of the best investments that I have made by far!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop table
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a laptop table to hold my computer while I was using it. This table works perfectly for that purpose. It's easy to adjust and has two folding clamps to keep my laptop computer in place. The only thing I would change is to make the legs a little shorter for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased after months of use
customer_reviews.text: This desk has held up nicely. I use it every night while sitting on the couch. Helps my neck and helps me write and type on a nice surface. Folds just fine, adjustable quality is nice. The little nubs on the top meant to hold your computer are well nigh useless in my opinion. I wish it was a bit wider of a footprint so I could "man spread" a bit, but all-in-all it's a very reasonable buy, and is a nice durable plastic desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jericho J.

customer_reviews.title: Versitile Laptop/iPad Table
customer_reviews.text: While on the couch, I feel the lowest height setting is a little too high for working with the table in the horizontal position, so I would never be able to use for work. However, when the table is tilted it is perfect for working on the iPad. Overall I am very satisfied as I purchased it for my iPad and it works great. Very glad I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Flexible lap desk or standing desk!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so convenient! The flexibility in the height as well as the surface angle is the key. I use it on my sofa or on my bed when I'm feeling lazy. When I want to do some work, I bring it to my desk to use it as a instant standing desk. When I want to sit again, I adjust the surface angle. That way, I can write/draw on an elevated surface and it's much better for my posture! The little stoppers help my tablet from falling off even at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a serviceable stand At best and it will hold your laptop, but in no way does it do anything well enough to justify the price. Its lowest height setting is still aggravatingly just a bit too tall, and the feet are only barely wide enough (front to back) to provide stability on a bed but not to the point you’ll ever trust it won’t fall over. As far as build quality is concerned, only time will tell but I’m not confident in the durability of the plastic hinges. For the cost, I wish I’d shopped more and relied on glowing reviews a lot less. But as with most anything, YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: K. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Practical and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little laptop stand if you want to work at your kitchen counter. To sit in an easy chair, it might be too wide. Depends on the size of your chair. For us it's too wide on our chair. And honestly on the chair or sofa, it's a little higher than feels comfortable even when set at lowest setting. Lots of variables go into whether or not you will be comfortable using it, but for sure excellent for counter-top.
customer_reviews.author: Anne777T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my work at home situation
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really have a den in my house. There is a computer desk that holds my kids’ gaming computer. Normally I can work from my kitchen island but with the coronavirus shutting down the schools, my kids are taking up that space to do their school work and they are a little loud. With this laptop desk I can retreat to my bedroom and work in comfort from my bed. Easy to set up and adjust. I wish I had this a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Marty A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop table!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use during my recovery after extensive ankle reconstruction surgery. Now I can't imagine not having it each and every day. This table has so many uses. It has great construction, looks very nice, is easy to use and stores away quickly. I highly recommend whether you are looking for a table to work on, use for reading/crafts or need while sick. It really is a great buy that is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Treacy

customer_reviews.title: Love this table, no more back and neck pain!  Get it and you will love it too❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I had back pain and neck pain from sitting on my bed studying and doing computer for a few days. I bought this table and received it within 5 days. It is so easy to set up and store away when I am ready for bed. Now I can sit straight on my back and stretch my legs while I am studying. Or I can put my PC on it and place them on the floor for my meditation and yoga practice. Get this table, you will love it like I do. Highly recommended 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Shani M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table that's easily adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little table/desk. My husbands back had been hurting so he has had to lay on his back on the floor and try to prop his laptop on his chest so he can use it. This table is perfect for use while laying on the bed, sitting on couch or on the floor. It adjusts up and down and also tilts. Thr little clips on it helps keep your laptop in place so it doesnt slide while the table is at an angle. It folds up and down quickly and easily. It's a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in our mobile, getting tired of no desk space and getting tired of holding books and magazines. This product is perfect. Taotronics does it again! Easily adjustable, nice surface for writing and drawing, much better neck posture and no more sore hands and arms from holding heavy books..now - to keep hubby from swiping it! Probably getting another one. Love the tilt adjustments..
customer_reviews.author: Natalie McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Portable Desk / very responsive Seller
customer_reviews.text: I am revising my original review to 4 stars after the seller reached out & addressed my original concerns. The desk surface is nice & the perfect size for my needs. The legs are the correct height when the desk is opened up. Be careful when folding it up. Convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Quite flimsy/Received full refund
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller reached out to me and offered a full refund, did not seem to want to piece back though I offered to send back. Pros: perfect size and has all of the intended features: tray angling, clips for your laptop, height extension. Cons: Very flimsy and cheaply made - the tray only stays in two positions: completely flat or completely angled; once sitting, the tray moves around quite a bit and it's not sturdy as you type (this review, for example). Overall, considering the price, I expected a bit more, a little more sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: N/A__

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Easy to Adjust
customer_reviews.text: While I mostly like this laptop table, I do wish I could tilt it down more. However, I like the finish, adjustable height, document holder & "stops" to keep things from sliding off when tilted. Works great for a bed tray as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Henson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Recently blew out my Achilles. Ordered this to enable me to work from the couch as I elevate my leg post surgery these next weeks. I have a MacBook Pro 13”. Everything fits nicely. Size of surface is perfect for cpu. Probably not enough space for a mouse without compromise. But I don’t use a mouse so all good. I’m a bigger guy 6’2” 220 lb. The width and the height of the adjustable legs were great. Folds up slim. Easy to adjust. Tilt option is wonderful. And the clips to keep the computer from sliding work great and don’t really get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: This desk is the perfect size,lightweight, and exactly what I was looking for, but... 1. One of the legs is crooked, and 2. The legs don't actually lock. They lock so they won't go back up without pushing the button, but they do not lock on the way down. Therefore, when opening the legs, I have to be careful not to pull on them or I need to readjust them. If it wasn't for those two issues, I'd be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Burns

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy and stable
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this little lap desk. It is nice and lightweight while being very sturdy. I use it for my laptop, iPad, iPhone, and for eating meals. I had been wanting one of these for ages, and I did a lot of research on different styles. I am very glad that I decided on this one. It is so practical that I use it every time I sit in the recliner. I HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane J.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great tray purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has Multiple disabilities , finding a tray to help her is very difficult. I’ve bought many trays and this is the First tray I’ve been happy with durability, ease, comfort and width.. ♥️ Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marine Mom x2

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product as a work station. I can’t get a plate to really stay on it (even with the nifty stopper hooks) in bed. My plates are probably heavy. Lighter ones or paper/plastic might work. But for a laptop it’s great. Can adjust it easily in numerous ways and there’s no assembly required. Good to go right out of the box. Best value if you’re looking for a bed desk/laptop stand that isn’t vented and those cost way more anyways.
